introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AI Wallpaper Generator
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: AI Wallpaper Generator turns simple prompts into breathtaking desktop and mobile wallpapers with cinematic lighting, crystal clarity, and endless styles.

items.title: Curated Style Presets
items.description: Pick from neon, vaporwave, anime, landscape, and minimalist presets tuned for wallpaper-perfect compositions.

items.title: Smart Prompt Assistant
items.description: Get guided suggestions that help you describe the scene, lighting, and mood for better AI results.

items.title: Optimized for Every Screen
items.description: Export wallpapers in 4K, ultrawide, and mobile ratios without losing detail or sharpness.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why creators love AI Wallpaper Generator
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Everything you need to produce on-brand wallpapers, from effortless prompt crafting to share-ready exports.

items.title: Studio-Grade Quality
items.description: Fine-tuned diffusion models deliver crisp lighting, balanced compositions, and natural textures fit for any display.

items.title: Automated Variations
items.description: Generate batches, tweak seeds, and remix colors instantly to keep exploring without repeating manual work.

items.title: Collaborative Collections
items.description: Share boards, vote on favorites, and deliver approved wallpapers to your community or clients in one click.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to create wallpapers with AI Wallpaper
usage.description: Bring your desktop and mobile screens to life in three simple steps:

items.title: Describe your scene
items.description: Write a short prompt or remix one of our curated inspirations to set the mood, lighting, and composition.

items.title: Fine-tune the style
items.description: Choose aspect ratios, style presets, seeds, and color palettes while previewing changes in real time.

items.title: Download or share
items.description: Export crisp 4K wallpapers, schedule auto-refresh for your devices, and share collections with a public link.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key features of AI Wallpaper Generator
feature.description: Design, iterate, and ship breathtaking wallpapers faster than ever.

items.title: Prompt Inspiration Library
items.description: Browse 200+ curated prompts with tags for mood, theme, and lighting to jump-start your creativity.

items.title: One-click Upscaling
items.description: Upscale to 4K and 8K with enhanced clarity while preserving the original composition.

items.title: Batch Rendering Queue
items.description: Queue up multiple prompts and aspect ratios simultaneously, then review the results in a unified gallery.

items.title: Adaptive Color Harmony
items.description: Let AI suggest complementary palettes based on your brand or upload a reference for perfect color matching.

items.title: Cloud Collections
items.description: Organize wallpapers into sharable collections with password protection and download tracking.

items.title: Cross-Device Sync
items.description: Sync wallpaper rotations across desktop, tablet, and mobile with scheduled updates.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Still curious? Say hi on Discord or email us â€” we reply fast.

items.title: What is AI Wallpaper Generator?
items.description: It's an AI-powered studio for designing high-resolution wallpapers. Describe your idea, choose presets, and download polished results in seconds.

items.title: Can I upload reference images?
items.description: Yes. Drop in photos, color swatches, or brand assets and the model will match the vibe while keeping your composition balanced.

items.title: Which resolutions do you support?
items.description: We support 4K, 5K, ultrawide, mobile, and custom ratios. You can upscale to 8K anytime without restarting the generation.

items.title: Do I own the wallpapers I generate?
items.description: Absolutely. Every wallpaper you create is yours to use commercially, share with your audience, or sell in your own packs.

items.title: Is there a free trial?
items.description: Sign up to claim 10 free credits â€” enough to test styles, presets, and the full export workflow before upgrading.

items.title: How do credits work?
items.description: Each standard render costs one credit. Upscaling, batch queues, and remixing variations use additional credits, all transparently tracked in your dashboard.
